page.title: 15ENTERTAINMENT:THE ARTS.
page.content: Chorley and District rely mainly on amateur organisations to provide concerts,plays and musicals.Chorley Little Theatre has its own theatre -a converted Cinema and produce 5 plays & 1 musical a year.Many of the district amateur groups are connected to local Churches and produce 1 or 2 plays a year in village halls and community centres.There are several choirs, as well as opportunities for musicians to play in brass and pipe bands around Chorley. There are also a Probus Society,Townswomen's Guild, W.I.,and Soroptomists International.There is 1 Cinema,Studio 4,open all week. The Chorley Arts Association is financed by the Borough Council,organising artists to perform eg.Stephan Grappelli and The Royal Shakespeare Company. Chorley is well situated, in a central location for Liverpool and Manchester.
